title: Lotto Dstny development rider Tijl De Decker dies after training crash
content:
The 22-year-old, who won Paris-Roubaix Espoirs this year, had collided with the back of a vehicle while out on a training ride.

Read the full article at Lotto Dstny development rider Tijl De Decker dies after training crash on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
